decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing lands as a resource to control the game. The key strategy involves using cards like Crop Rotation, Exploration, and Life from the Loam to quickly assemble powerful land combinations such as Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage. By disrupting the opponent with cards like Wasteland and Sphere of Resistance, while also having access to utility lands like Maze of Ith and Karakas, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent until it can secure the win with a powerful land combo or grind out a victory with incremental advantages.

This Legacy Aggro-Ninja deck aims to quickly and efficiently control the board with disruptive creatures like Ingenious Infiltrator and Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow, while utilizing the Changeling Outcast and Ornithopter combo for early aggression. The deck also includes interaction with spells like Daze and Force of Will to disrupt opponents' strategies. Additionally, the deck includes powerful cards like Back to Basics and Retrofitter Foundry to further control the game and create advantage. Overall, this deck seeks to outpace opponents and close out games quickly with its aggressive Ninja creatures.

The key concept of this deck is to maintain a fast and aggressive tempo while utilizing cantrips and disruptive spells to control the game. By deploying threats like Delver of Secrets, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Murktide Regent early on, the deck aims to pressure the opponent while protecting its board presence with countermagic like Daze and Force of Will. The inclusion of cards like Brainstorm, Ponder, and Mishra's Bauble allow for consistent card selection and manipulation, ensuring the deck can adapt to different situations and maintain its aggressive strategy throughout the game.

This Legacy Death's Shadow Aggro deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with cards like Street Wraith and Reanimate to power out strong threats like Death's Shadow and Murktide Regent. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Grief and Force of Will to disrupt the opponent's game plan. With a mix of efficient creatures and powerful spells, this deck aims to apply early pressure and disrupt the opponent's strategy to secure a quick victory. Additionally, cards like Daze and Wasteland are included to further disrupt the opponent's plans and maintain tempo advantage.

This deck focuses on using aggressive creatures like Delver of Secrets, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Murktide Regent to quickly pressure the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Force of Will and Wasteland. The goal is to control the game tempo by efficiently countering spells and removing threats, all while maintaining card advantage through cantrips like Brainstorm and Ponder. The deck's strategy revolves around building an early board presence and maintaining pressure on the opponent until victory is achieved.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with Cascade spells, allowing the player to cast powerful spells for free and create a strong board presence early in the game. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy with counter spells and removal, while steadily building up their board state to secure a victory. By utilizing cards like Shardless Agent and Violent Outburst, the deck can consistently cascade into key spells like Crashing Footfalls and Lórien Revealed, putting pressure on the opponent and forcing them to react quickly to survive.

The deck focuses on using various cards like Entomb, Dark Ritual, and Animate Dead to quickly bring powerful creatures like Griselbrand, Sheoldred, and Atraxa onto the battlefield. It also includes disruption cards like Thoughtseize and Grief to control the opponent's hand. The goal is to set up a fast and efficient reanimation combo to overwhelm and outpace the opponent, combining graveyard recursion with powerful creatures to gain a significant advantage. The versatile options in the deck allow for adaptability and resilience in different matchups.

The deck focuses on utilizing fast mana and disruptive elements to quickly lock down the opponent's resources and overwhelm them with aggressive creatures. Key cards like Blood Moon, Chalice of the Void, and Magus of the Moon disrupt the opponent's mana base, while cards like Goblin Rabblemaster and Fury provide a quick clock to pressure the opponent. The deck aims to quickly establish board control and prevent the opponent from effectively casting spells, ultimately leading to a swift victory.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble the key combo pieces, Show and Tell and Omniscience, in order to cheat big creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn onto the battlefield. The deck utilizes cards like Brainstorm, Ponder, and Cunning Wish to dig for combo pieces and protect its game plan with Force of Will. The inclusion of cards like Dress Down and Sea Gate Restoration offer additional utility and flexibility in various game scenarios. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures and game-ending plays.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier using cards like Entomb and Grief, then bring them back onto the battlefield with cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead. The deck also includes disruption with cards like Force of Will and Daze to protect the combo pieces and control the game. It aims to combo off and overwhelm the opponent with large, hard-hitting creatures before they have a chance to respond effectively.

The deck focuses on controlling the opponent through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and efficient card draw. It aims to establish board dominance with powerful threats like Murktide Regent while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares. As a Bant Control deck, it utilizes a mix of white, blue, and green cards to provide a versatile range of answers to various threats. The deck aims to outmaneuver opponents by carefully managing resources and maintaining board control to secure victory.

The main strategy of this deck is to quickly assemble a combination of cards, particularly Doomsday, Thassa's Oracle, and Street Wraith, in order to win the game on the spot. The deck also includes various card draw and selection spells, along with disruption like Thoughtseize and Daze, to help facilitate its combo. Additionally, there are mana-producing cards like Lion's Eye Diamond and Dark Ritual to accelerate the deck's game plan. The inclusion of cards like Lotus Petal and Lion's Eye Diamond allows the deck to generate the necessary mana to execute its game-winning combo efficiently.

This deck aims to aggressively disrupt the opponent while applying pressure consistently with its creatures. It includes key cards like Mother of Runes for protection, Gaddock Teeg to disrupt noncreature spells, and Knight of the Reliquary to tutor up important lands like Wasteland or Gaea's Cradle. The deck also has efficient removal in Swords to Plowshares and uses Green Sun's Zenith to tutor up creatures as needed. By disrupting the opponent's game plan and maintaining a strong board presence, this deck seeks to control the game and secure a victory.
